about_the_game: The complete original soundtrack for Republic of Pirates composed by Gordon Turner & Nikifor Shalaev. Transport yourself to the heart of the Caribbean with this huge collection of tranquil ambient tracks, rousing battle scores, and intriguing theme variants.

content_descriptors.notes:
The campaign mode narrative includes references to drug use, prostitution, piracy, and murder.

Players can build a brothel and an opium hut building that provide a need to nearby worker houses. Players can produce hemp and tobacco on hemp plantations and tobacco plantations, respectively.
